properties.displayName: Azure Event Hub namespaces should have local authentication methods disabled
properties.description: Disabling local authentication methods improves security by ensuring that Azure Event Hub namespaces exclusively require Azure Active Directory identities for authentication. Learn more at: https://aka.ms/disablelocalauth-eh.

metadata.description: 'Audit' allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. 'Deny' blocks the resource creation. 'Disable' turns off the policy.
